record.field: result = round(categories.BASIC + categories.OT + categories.ALW - categories.FITCALC - categories.DED, 0)
For Braam coldroom employees daily OT is calculated at Night OT rates.

26 - worked_days.AWOL.number_of_days - worked_days.LVANNUAL.number_of_days - worked_days.LVBEREAVEMENT.number_of_days - worked_days.LVCIVIC.number_of_days - worked_days.LVMATERNITY.number_of_days - worked_days.LVMMEDICAL.number_of_days - worked_days.LVSICK.number_of_days - worked_days.LVSICK50.number_of_days - worked_days.LVSICK00.number_of_days - worked_days.LVPTO.number_of_days - worked_days.LVWEDDING.number_of_days
For each day they work they get one hour extra regular daily OT pay.
